search_results.evidence: An antibody-drug conjugate (ADC) consisting of a humanized monoclonal antibody directed against the receptor tyrosine kinase-like orphan receptor 1 (ROR1) conjugated to the microtubule-disrupting agent monomethyl auristatin E (MMAE).

hallucination_detection.note: All extracted items (Zilovertamab Vedotin, Cyclophosphamide, Doxorubicin, Prednisone, Rituximab) are valid therapeutic drugs confirmed via search and medical knowledge.

omission_detection.note: No other therapeutic drugs were identified in the title. 'Waveline-007' is correctly identified as a trial name and excluded.

rule_compliance.note: Title casing is maintained, and generic names are used correctly.

misclassification_detection.note: Keywords 'in combination with' and 'plus' correctly indicate a co-primary administration of all listed agents.

validation_reasoning:
1. Verified Zilovertamab Vedotin as a valid therapeutic ADC via grounded search.
2. Confirmed Cyclophosphamide, Doxorubicin, Prednisone, and Rituximab are standard therapeutic agents (R-CHP components).
3. Analyzed title structure: 'Zilovertamab Vedotin in combination with [regimen] plus Rituximab' indicates all are part of the primary experimental arm.
4. Checked for omissions: 'Waveline-007' is a study identifier and correctly excluded per Rule 32.
5. All extraction and classification rules were followed accurately.
